name: Tim Brown's Playbook: Michigan State vs. Notre Dame - September 19, 1987
description: Brown gets backed up to the opposing 34-yard line before miraculously returning his second punt for a touchdown against rival Michigan State. In 1987, Brown would catch 34 passes for 846 yards, return 34 punts for 401 yards, rush for 144 yards, gain 456 yards on 23 kickoff returns and win the Heisman Trophy. Fans that collect all 4 Playbooks from Tim Brown by August 9, 2021 at 11:59 PM EST will be invited to join a digital meet-and-greet with Tim himself. The collector who purchases the most Tim Brown Playbooks within that same window will receive a signed jersey and helmet from Tim. Full terms and conditions can be found at ftx.us/hof_terms.pdf.
series: Tim Brown's Playbook: Michigan State vs. Notre Dame - September 19, 1987

name: Earl Campbell's Playbook: Texas vs. Houston - November 5th, 1977
description: While sick and battling a fever, Earl Campbell receives the pitch on a quarterback option, and takes it 40 yards for his third touchdown of the game. He would lead the nation in his senior year and become the first University of Texas player to receive the Heisman Trophy. Fans that collect all 4 Playbooks from Earl Campbell by August 9, 2021 at 11:59 PM EST will be invited to join a digital meet-and-greet with Earl himself. The collector who purchases the most Earl Campbell Playbooks within that same window will receive a signed jersey and helmet from Earl. Full terms and conditions can be found at ftx.us/hof_terms.pdf.
series: Earl Campbell's Playbook: Texas vs. Houston - November 5th, 1977

name: Marcus Allen's Playbook: Kansas City Chiefs vs. Detriot Lions - November 29, 1996
description: On Thanksgiving Day, Marcus Allen scores his second touchdown of the day - a one-yard game-winning score. Allen would surpass Walter Payton's rushing touchdowns record (110) with career touchdowns number 111 and 112 recorded in the 28-24 win. Fans that collect all 4 Playbooks from Marcus Allen by August 9, 2021 at 11:59 PM EST will be invited to join a digital meet-and-greet with Marcus himself. The collector who purchases the most Marcus Allen Playbooks within that same window will receive a signed jersey and helmet from Marcus. Full terms and conditions can be found at ftx.us/hof_terms.pdf.
series: Marcus Allen's Playbook: Kansas City Chiefs vs. Detriot Lions - November 29, 1996
